attributes.action: Help stop ISIS by targeting their oil fields directly
attributes.additional_details:
When they are eventually down to no money, they will be unable to keep buying weapons and ammunition, meaning they will start to fall apart and get weaker. We must of course continue to destroy other Daesh bases as well.

Please sign this petition to get a debate in Parliament and a response from the Government.
attributes.background: On Wednesday 2nd December, David Cameron won the Syria Airstrikes vote, having UK already dropping bombs on Syria. We must target the oil fields directly, that is how they are making money - by producing and selling oil. Destroying their oil fields will eventually leave them with no money.
